title: Slack Web API
description: One way to interact with the Slack platform is its HTTP RPC-based Web API, a collection of methods requiring OAuth 2.0-based user, bot, or workspace tokens blessed with related OAuth scopes.

admin_apps_approved_list.title: admin_apps_approved_list
admin_apps_approved_list.description: List approved apps for an org or workspace.

admin_apps_requests_list.title: admin_apps_requests_list
admin_apps_requests_list.description: List app requests for a team/workspace.

admin_apps_restricted_list.title: admin_apps_restricted_list
admin_apps_restricted_list.description: List restricted apps for an org or workspace.

admin_conversations_ekm_listOriginalConn.title: admin_conversations_ekm_listOriginalConnectedChannelInfo
admin_conversations_ekm_listOriginalConn.description: List all disconnected channels--i.e., channels that were once connected to other workspaces and then disconnected--and the corresponding original channel IDs for key revocation with EKM.

admin_conversations_getConversationPrefs.title: admin_conversations_getConversationPrefs
admin_conversations_getConversationPrefs.description: Get conversation preferences for a public or private channel.

admin_conversations_getTeams.title: admin_conversations_getTeams
admin_conversations_getTeams.description: Get all the workspaces a given public or private channel is connected to within this Enterprise org.

admin_conversations_restrictAccess_listG.title: admin_conversations_restrictAccess_listGroups
admin_conversations_restrictAccess_listG.description: List all IDP Groups linked to a channel

admin_conversations_search.title: admin_conversations_search
admin_conversations_search.description: Search for public or private channels in an Enterprise organization.

admin_emoji_list.title: admin_emoji_list
admin_emoji_list.description: List emoji for an Enterprise Grid organization.

admin_inviteRequests_approved_list.title: admin_inviteRequests_approved_list
admin_inviteRequests_approved_list.description: List all approved workspace invite requests.

admin_inviteRequests_denied_list.title: admin_inviteRequests_denied_list
admin_inviteRequests_denied_list.description: List all denied workspace invite requests.

admin_inviteRequests_list.title: admin_inviteRequests_list
admin_inviteRequests_list.description: List all pending workspace invite requests.

admin_teams_admins_list.title: admin_teams_admins_list
admin_teams_admins_list.description: List all of the admins on a given workspace.

admin_teams_list.title: admin_teams_list
admin_teams_list.description: List all teams on an Enterprise organization

admin_teams_owners_list.title: admin_teams_owners_list
admin_teams_owners_list.description: List all of the owners on a given workspace.

admin_teams_settings_info.title: admin_teams_settings_info
admin_teams_settings_info.description: Fetch information about settings in a workspace

admin_usergroups_listChannels.title: admin_usergroups_listChannels
admin_usergroups_listChannels.description: List the channels linked to an org-level IDP group (user group).

apps_event_authorizations_list.title: apps_event_authorizations_list
apps_event_authorizations_list.description: Get a list of authorizations for the given event context. Each authorization represents an app installation that the event is visible to.

apps_permissions_info.title: apps_permissions_info
apps_permissions_info.description: Returns list of permissions this app has on a team.

apps_permissions_request.title: apps_permissions_request
apps_permissions_request.description: Allows an app to request additional scopes

apps_permissions_resources_list.title: apps_permissions_resources_list
apps_permissions_resources_list.description: Returns list of resource grants this app has on a team.

apps_permissions_scopes_list.title: apps_permissions_scopes_list
apps_permissions_scopes_list.description: Returns list of scopes this app has on a team.

apps_uninstall.title: apps_uninstall
apps_uninstall.description: Uninstalls your app from a workspace.

bots_info.title: bots_info
bots_info.description: Gets information about a bot user.

chat_getPermalink.title: chat_getPermalink
chat_getPermalink.description: Retrieve a permalink URL for a specific extant message

chat_scheduledMessages_list.title: chat_scheduledMessages_list
chat_scheduledMessages_list.description: Returns a list of scheduled messages.

conversations_history.title: conversations_history
conversations_history.description: Fetches a conversation's history of messages and events.

conversations_list.title: conversations_list
conversations_list.description: Lists all channels in a Slack team.

conversations_replies.title: conversations_replies
conversations_replies.description: Retrieve a thread of messages posted to a conversation

dialog_open.title: dialog_open
dialog_open.description: Open a dialog with a user

dnd_info.title: dnd_info
dnd_info.description: Retrieves a user's current Do Not Disturb status.

dnd_teamInfo.title: dnd_teamInfo
dnd_teamInfo.description: Retrieves the Do Not Disturb status for up to 50 users on a team.

emoji_list.title: emoji_list
emoji_list.description: Lists custom emoji for a team.

files_list.title: files_list
files_list.description: List for a team, in a channel, or from a user with applied filters.

files_remote_info.title: files_remote_info
files_remote_info.description: Retrieve information about a remote file added to Slack

files_remote_list.title: files_remote_list
files_remote_list.description: Retrieve information about a remote file added to Slack

files_remote_share.title: files_remote_share
files_remote_share.description: Share a remote file into a channel.

migration_exchange.title: migration_exchange
migration_exchange.description: For Enterprise Grid workspaces, map local user IDs to global user IDs

oauth_access.title: oauth_access
oauth_access.description: Exchanges a temporary OAuth verifier code for an access token.

oauth_token.title: oauth_token
oauth_token.description: Exchanges a temporary OAuth verifier code for a workspace token.

oauth_v2_access.title: oauth_v2_access
oauth_v2_access.description: Exchanges a temporary OAuth verifier code for an access token.

pins_list.title: pins_list
pins_list.description: Lists items pinned to a channel.

reactions_list.title: reactions_list
reactions_list.description: Lists reactions made by a user.

reminders_list.title: reminders_list
reminders_list.description: Lists all reminders created by or for a given user.

rtm_connect.title: rtm_connect
rtm_connect.description: Starts a Real Time Messaging session.

search_messages.title: search_messages
search_messages.description: Searches for messages matching a query.

team_accessLogs.title: team_accessLogs
team_accessLogs.description: Gets the access logs for the current team.

team_billableInfo.title: team_billableInfo
team_billableInfo.description: Gets billable users information for the current team.

team_info.title: team_info
team_info.description: Gets information about the current team.

team_integrationLogs.title: team_integrationLogs
team_integrationLogs.description: Gets the integration logs for the current team.

usergroups_list.title: usergroups_list
usergroups_list.description: List all User Groups for a team

usergroups_users_list.title: usergroups_users_list
usergroups_users_list.description: List all users in a User Group

users_conversations.title: users_conversations
users_conversations.description: List conversations the calling user may access.

users_list.title: users_list
users_list.description: Lists all users in a Slack team.

users_lookupByEmail.title: users_lookupByEmail
users_lookupByEmail.description: Find a user with an email address.

views_open.title: views_open
views_open.description: Open a view for a user.

views_publish.title: views_publish
views_publish.description: Publish a static view for a User.

views_push.title: views_push
views_push.description: Push a view onto the stack of a root view.

workflows_stepCompleted.title: workflows_stepCompleted
workflows_stepCompleted.description: Indicate that an app's step in a workflow completed execution.

workflows_stepFailed.title: workflows_stepFailed
workflows_stepFailed.description: Indicate that an app's step in a workflow failed to execute.

workflows_updateStep.title: workflows_updateStep
workflows_updateStep.description: Update the configuration for a workflow extension step.

admin_apps_approve.title: admin_apps_approve
admin_apps_approve.description: Approve an app for installation on a workspace.

admin_apps_restrict.title: admin_apps_restrict
admin_apps_restrict.description: Restrict an app for installation on a workspace.

admin_conversations_archive.title: admin_conversations_archive
admin_conversations_archive.description: Archive a public or private channel.

admin_conversations_convertToPrivate.title: admin_conversations_convertToPrivate
admin_conversations_convertToPrivate.description: Convert a public channel to a private channel.

admin_conversations_create.title: admin_conversations_create
admin_conversations_create.description: Create a public or private channel-based conversation.

admin_conversations_delete.title: admin_conversations_delete
admin_conversations_delete.description: Delete a public or private channel.

admin_conversations_disconnectShared.title: admin_conversations_disconnectShared
admin_conversations_disconnectShared.description: Disconnect a connected channel from one or more workspaces.

admin_conversations_invite.title: admin_conversations_invite
admin_conversations_invite.description: Invite a user to a public or private channel.

admin_conversations_rename.title: admin_conversations_rename
admin_conversations_rename.description: Rename a public or private channel.

admin_conversations_restrictAccess_addGr.title: admin_conversations_restrictAccess_addGroup
admin_conversations_restrictAccess_addGr.description: Add an allowlist of IDP groups for accessing a channel

admin_conversations_restrictAccess_remov.title: admin_conversations_restrictAccess_removeGroup
admin_conversations_restrictAccess_remov.description: Remove a linked IDP group linked from a private channel

admin_conversations_setConversationPrefs.title: admin_conversations_setConversationPrefs
admin_conversations_setConversationPrefs.description: Set the posting permissions for a public or private channel.

admin_conversations_setTeams.title: admin_conversations_setTeams
admin_conversations_setTeams.description: Set the workspaces in an Enterprise grid org that connect to a public or private channel.

admin_conversations_unarchive.title: admin_conversations_unarchive
admin_conversations_unarchive.description: Unarchive a public or private channel.

admin_emoji_remove.title: admin_emoji_remove
admin_emoji_remove.description: Remove an emoji across an Enterprise Grid organization

admin_teams_settings_setDefaultChannels.title: admin_teams_settings_setDefaultChannels
admin_teams_settings_setDefaultChannels.description: Set the default channels of a workspace.

admin_teams_settings_setDescription.title: admin_teams_settings_setDescription
admin_teams_settings_setDescription.description: Set the description of a given workspace.

admin_teams_settings_setDiscoverability.title: admin_teams_settings_setDiscoverability
admin_teams_settings_setDiscoverability.description: An API method that allows admins to set the discoverability of a given workspace

admin_teams_settings_setIcon.title: admin_teams_settings_setIcon
admin_teams_settings_setIcon.description: Sets the icon of a workspace.

admin_teams_settings_setName.title: admin_teams_settings_setName
admin_teams_settings_setName.description: Set the name of a given workspace.

admin_usergroups_addChannels.title: admin_usergroups_addChannels
admin_usergroups_addChannels.description: Add one or more default channels to an IDP group.

admin_usergroups_addTeams.title: admin_usergroups_addTeams
admin_usergroups_addTeams.description: Associate one or more default workspaces with an organization-wide IDP group.

admin_usergroups_removeChannels.title: admin_usergroups_removeChannels
admin_usergroups_removeChannels.description: Remove one or more default channels from an org-level IDP group (user group).

admin_users_assign.title: admin_users_assign
admin_users_assign.description: Add an Enterprise user to a workspace.

admin_users_invite.title: admin_users_invite
admin_users_invite.description: Invite a user to a workspace.

admin_users_remove.title: admin_users_remove
admin_users_remove.description: Remove a user from a workspace.

admin_users_session_invalidate.title: admin_users_session_invalidate
admin_users_session_invalidate.description: Invalidate a single session for a user by session_id

admin_users_session_reset.title: admin_users_session_reset
admin_users_session_reset.description: Wipes all valid sessions on all devices for a given user

admin_users_setAdmin.title: admin_users_setAdmin
admin_users_setAdmin.description: Set an existing guest, regular user, or owner to be an admin user.

admin_users_setExpiration.title: admin_users_setExpiration
admin_users_setExpiration.description: Set an expiration for a guest user

admin_users_setOwner.title: admin_users_setOwner
admin_users_setOwner.description: Set an existing guest, regular user, or admin user to be a workspace owner.

admin_users_setRegular.title: admin_users_setRegular
admin_users_setRegular.description: Set an existing guest user, admin user, or owner to be a regular user.

calls_participants_add.title: calls_participants_add
calls_participants_add.description: Registers new participants added to a Call.

calls_participants_remove.title: calls_participants_remove
calls_participants_remove.description: Registers participants removed from a Call.

chat_deleteScheduledMessage.title: chat_deleteScheduledMessage
chat_deleteScheduledMessage.description: Deletes a pending scheduled message from the queue.

chat_meMessage.title: chat_meMessage
chat_meMessage.description: Share a me message into a channel.

chat_postEphemeral.title: chat_postEphemeral
chat_postEphemeral.description: Sends an ephemeral message to a user in a channel.

chat_postMessage.title: chat_postMessage
chat_postMessage.description: Sends a message to a channel.

chat_scheduleMessage.title: chat_scheduleMessage
chat_scheduleMessage.description: Schedules a message to be sent to a channel.

chat_unfurl.title: chat_unfurl
chat_unfurl.description: Provide custom unfurl behavior for user-posted URLs

conversations_close.title: conversations_close
conversations_close.description: Closes a direct message or multi-person direct message.

conversations_create.title: conversations_create
conversations_create.description: Initiates a public or private channel-based conversation

conversations_kick.title: conversations_kick
conversations_kick.description: Removes a user from a conversation.

conversations_mark.title: conversations_mark
conversations_mark.description: Sets the read cursor in a channel.

conversations_open.title: conversations_open
conversations_open.description: Opens or resumes a direct message or multi-person direct message.

conversations_setPurpose.title: conversations_setPurpose
conversations_setPurpose.description: Sets the purpose for a conversation.

conversations_setTopic.title: conversations_setTopic
conversations_setTopic.description: Sets the topic for a conversation.

dnd_endDnd.title: dnd_endDnd
dnd_endDnd.description: Ends the current user's Do Not Disturb session immediately.

dnd_endSnooze.title: dnd_endSnooze
dnd_endSnooze.description: Ends the current user's snooze mode immediately.

dnd_setSnooze.title: dnd_setSnooze
dnd_setSnooze.description: Turns on Do Not Disturb mode for the current user, or changes its duration.

files_comments_delete.title: files_comments_delete
files_comments_delete.description: Deletes an existing comment on a file.

files_remote_add.title: files_remote_add
files_remote_add.description: Adds a file from a remote service

files_revokePublicURL.title: files_revokePublicURL
files_revokePublicURL.description: Revokes public/external sharing access for a file

files_sharedPublicURL.title: files_sharedPublicURL
files_sharedPublicURL.description: Enables a file for public/external sharing.

pins_add.title: pins_add
pins_add.description: Pins an item to a channel.

pins_remove.title: pins_remove
pins_remove.description: Un-pins an item from a channel.

reactions_add.title: reactions_add
reactions_add.description: Adds a reaction to an item.

reactions_remove.title: reactions_remove
reactions_remove.description: Removes a reaction from an item.

stars_add.title: stars_add
stars_add.description: Adds a star to an item.

stars_remove.title: stars_remove
stars_remove.description: Removes a star from an item.

usergroups_users_update.title: usergroups_users_update
usergroups_users_update.description: Update the list of users for a User Group

users_profile_set.title: users_profile_set
users_profile_set.description: Set the profile information for a user.

users_setActive.title: users_setActive
users_setActive.description: Marked a user as active. Deprecated and non-functional.
